item.description:
Join me for the Adopt a Road Project

It is a Spring cleanup of West Road in South Windsor.
This takes less than 2 hours to help make South Windsor a little
cleaner. Our volunteers will then be taken out for a Pizza after
the event.

We will meet at West Street park in the sand on the street

across from the parking lot of the new firehouse.

Corner of West St and Sullivan Ave.

The official address is 765 Sullivan Avenue South Windsor, CT
item.name: Adopt a Road
